website_summaries.verdict: It may not win any awards for style, but this tough beverage tub will stay with you for the long haul.
pros: Insulated to prevent leaks and remain sweat-free
cons: Some users have received scratched or damaged products

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this tub!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bucket before a large family fish fry. We put 10 lbs. of ice in it at about 4:30 and there was a tiny bit of water to drain at 9:30. We all kept looking in the bottom of the tub for water but there wasn't any. It was indoors so I'm sure that made a difference. It looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Construction, No Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these buckets for use in an event space. My primary concerns were being 100% sure they wouldn't leak and avoiding the sweating issue making condensation collect and get the table wet. These things absolutely aren't going to leak, and their insulation keeps them sweat-free. Couldn't ask for more from a tub cooler.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cantrall

customer_reviews.title: USED OR NEW????
customer_reviews.text: I think this product has the potential to be awesome!! The first one I received had scratches, like it had already been used and what seemed to be little cracks by a handle. Then I order a replacement which I received and it too came scratched up and I guess the little cracks by the handle are just how its made; AND the very necessary stopper was broken, not attached at all, rendering the tub useless. So, help? I have to return the first one before I can return the second. I know these are good products.... Made in Texas..... perhaps I just got lucky twice?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for more!
customer_reviews.text: Deck party in 86 degree heat - ice barely melted. Drinks/ice stayed cold for over 6 hours. And the drain is the piece de resistance. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rikki B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Short A Short Time
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep sodas and water cold during an all day meeting for work. The ice started melting pretty quickly. Overall, it still kept the drinks cold for the time we needed it to, but I don’t see the ice lasting very long outside (meeting was indoors). It’s very sturdy and the handles are easy to hold. It was a good alternative to to an ice chest.
customer_reviews.author: CBarber

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken but functional
customer_reviews.text: This works as could be expected for a party bucket. I would give it a higher rating but mine arrived missing one of the handle covers. This doesn't impact the performance of the cooler but it does make it harder to carry. It wasn't worth replacing it because of the bulk of the item and the hassle that would be involved in shipping it back but it is something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Sweat & Leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Great party bucket for presenting beer and wine to guests. Expect this to last a long time given the handles are molded into the bucket. The design should eliminate leaks and insulation should prevent sweating. Also manageable carrying size when moving ice from my ice machine to the boat. I also purchased the. The Party Pail fits nicely inside the Party Bucket to conserve storage space.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it said that it would keep drinks cold for a long period of time. I took it to the park, filled it with ice and drinks and within one hour the ice was melted and the drinks were warm. I had purchased a bucket from the dollar store to put the extra ice in. Guess what? The dollar bucket kept the ice cold and it melted slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B.

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great beverage cooler. Did not sweat and held a decent amount of bottled water and beer bottles along with ice for my parrty.
customer_reviews.author: MarJen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the damage
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly but I unpacked it and it looks like a used item. There are scars and scratches all over it. Additionally, there Is a haze all over the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Aric White

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a campervan but the sink I installed just wasn't big enough or deep enough for washing my hair and chihuahuas. I ought this to replace it and it works perfectly. plus when not in use as a sink it is big enough to tote things around in. I can fit my whole head in without any problem and so far the drain port has never leaked. This was an easy quick fix to a problem that works perfectly. It feels sturdier than I expected too.
customer_reviews.author: CRN

customer_reviews.title: Good product- quality issues
customer_reviews.text: The bucket was delivered damage. The damage was not from shipping. It was missing a handle. This should have been discovered prior to shipping. So I had to return. I was able to find one locally for the gift. I have 2 myself & really like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Nice but leaky
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, and cools as expected. However, the drain plug leaks, which is something I've never experienced with past products I have owned from this brand. So, no good for an indoor party unless you want to take up more room by adding a bucket on the floor and perching this on a table above it.
customer_reviews.author: MsKat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful big sturdy ice bucket.
customer_reviews.text: I use one bucket just for ice for the drinks. The other for both ice and drinks. The plastic is nice and strong. No worries carrying it. I reccomend a sturdy metal ice scooper and since the bucket is plastic no clanking noise. The bucket is so wide the drinks are displayed well. No more sticking your hand in freezing water to find that one particular flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Blanche Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine and kept cool for a few hours.
customer_reviews.text: The handle arrived completely off from the bucket but luckily was not broken and I was able to place back together. It does however seem to be one of those things that will continue to happen randomly but it’s not a big deal. Overall it worked great. Held my drinks in the ice and kept cool through the night. Easy to empty out.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these. My first two were stolen and I was heartbroken because I use these all the time for school events and when my kids' friends come over, etc. I bought two more and what I love about them is that they are lightweight and double-insulated so the bucket does NOT sweat when filled with ice.
customer_reviews.author: JooJi

customer_reviews.title: Defected
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Father’s Day gifts. One is fine..the other is defected and now it’s too late to return. Disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: brennda

customer_reviews.title: Best beverage container ever!
customer_reviews.text: These containers are fantastic! They hold numerous bottles of wine or beer and soda. When the party was over the ice had barely melted (we used these inside the house). I was looking for a durable, insulated, non-leaking bucket for beverages and this did not disappoint. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry T

customer_reviews.title: Look classy for outdoor wedding Quality and strong
customer_reviews.text: We purchased six of these. Used them for beer and wine at outdoor wedding. The black and silver color and the quality made these look great. Lightweight so you can carry several at a time to set up. We most definitely will purchase more for outdoor parties.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These keep ice a good long time indoors for parties, I haven't used them outside yet. For me I especially like that they are available in black! I have an annual Halloween party and it is neigh impossible to find coolers of any type in black! Take a hint Igloo
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great looking, keep your beverages icy cold!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! We will use these for years. 95' day, much of the ice remained unmelted--it was a great test for their purpose. Thickly insulated keeping beverages icy cold, great size, beautiful color on the patio, can be used indoors if necessary. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gaileth

customer_reviews.title: It is highly irritating to purchase a “new” item and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is highly irritating to purchase a “new” item and have it ship with such obvious scratching. No impressed. Otherwise, works as described. Seller/shopper should pay more attention.
customer_reviews.author: Gina V.

customer_reviews.title: Will keep ice for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I spotted this and thought it would be better than our usual lidded cooler we put out when we have gatherings. It kept everything cold well overnight and ice still in there in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: AGL

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once but it worked great. It sat in the sun on a 85 degree sunny pool party day. There was still tons of ice in it at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: honeysuckle75

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Three of these were under our Christmas tree this year, two ordered from Amazon. They were filled with gifts. The spout allowing this to be drained so easily is great idea. One of ours actually had a bottle opener attached to handle, but not the ones from Amazon. So I purchased openers elsewhere to attach. Fun for cookouts, deck parties, and boats. Great color and great quality. Will buy more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: J.Man

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all the party buckets before deciding on this one and I'm so happy I chose it. It's lightweight and holds lots of bottles. The nicest feature is that there is a drain so that once the ice melted I was able to easily water for our thirsty California plants.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Party tub
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this last minute for a big house party. I loved it. Put chilling wines and ciders in it. Great size. It seemed a little expensive for what it is, but I feel like it is durable
customer_reviews.author: boyce

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I order catering at the office quite often and this is the perfect container for the ice they deliver. The spout in the rear makes it easy to dispose of any water in the bottom of the bucket. This is the second purchase that is used as a back up for large crowds
customer_reviews.author: Y. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect counter cooler
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this. I love to host, and this easily fit several Champaign’s bottles. Kept it inside for the party and there was still ice in it the next day. It’s pretty sturdy. Can’t wait to continue to use it in the future and it isn’t an eye sore on the counter either!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This was way better than I expected. It’s very sturdy. The ice kept in it for a very long time. And it even has a plug. Igloo really did a nice design job.
customer_reviews.author: marie fan

customer_reviews.title: Works well shape needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: These keep ice for up to 24 hours. Handles make them easy to move around. They barely sweat. The design makes placing drinks in them awkward, so they don't hold as many as they could if they were a different shape.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Great product - need more color options
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and at such an amazing price! Didn’t sweat and kept our ice cold for hours! Wish there were more color options though - white or grey.
customer_reviews.author: Jordin Liskin

customer_reviews.title: Great Igloo Party Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great product; large enough to hold several bottles of wine/beer/soft drinks. Very sturdy and easy to clean. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RA 61 Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great party bucket
customer_reviews.text: While maybe not the cutest option, but this is a solid party bucket. Doesn’t leak like some of the metal options and it’s seriously insulated, my ice did not melt for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Insulated Ice Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Very nice insulated bucket for ice and drinks. Our bartender used it at our recent wedding and it worked out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Warminazj

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!  Great insulation and no sweating.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Looks very nice and love the plug on the side to drain it. We used the same ice for two days as it stayed cold for more than 24 hours. We just drained the water and added a little more ice and it was perfect for two days. Going to order a second one!
customer_reviews.author: JSBert

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: We used this to hold the ice at a graduation party and it kept the ice cold for several hours - served its purpose! It’s really sturdy and we’re very happy with the quality. Some of the ones we saw in the shabby but this one will be around a long while.
customer_reviews.author: 3girls520

customer_reviews.title: Damaged But Still Good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and one had a broken handle when I received them. But they are large and keep ice for a very long time. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: E Ray Evans

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot, easy to drain, nice enough for inside our outside events! My husband broke his foot and it became the perfect soaker tub!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kingman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, does not leak, and very durable. I just wish I had bought this a few years back. Use it for events at my college and works even better than expected. Best of all, does not sweat. You won't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: This party bucket is Amazinggggggggg! Held ice from 12-730 and had a tiny bit of water. Tiny amount. So happy and the fam asked about it since they too were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty, attractive ice container that won't sweat all over the place at parties! LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: dhdjms

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on side on bucket (like other reviews mention)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, but there were huge scratches on the back of the product. Which I don't quite understand why, because the product was packaged very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is getting married this year, so we have multiple functions at our house. These are perfect party alternatives to coolers. They’re not too heavy, they hold champagne, sodas, beer or water and look appropriate with each. I’m so glad we got them and the value was awesome! These are a definite ‘recommend’ -
customer_reviews.author: Karin Hunt

customer_reviews.title: These are Wonderful! Light yet thick enough that it acts as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are Wonderful! Light yet thick enough that it acts as a cooler, has a drain too. It can be used for beverages or to place food that must be kept cool, such as mac salad. Just put in some ice or ice packs and put the serving dish on top. If needed, I would most certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: doesn't sweat!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this because my other metal beverage bucket sweats and gets water everywhere. My friend used his igloo bucket and no problem! So while I haven't used this yet, I am thrilled to have it and can't wait for my next party!
customer_reviews.author: Dancingqueen50ish

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice quality and a VERY nice price. Bought for a bridal shower and several people were checking it out! I'm going to order one for myself!! Nicely insulated and love that it has a plug to drain some water out during use.
customer_reviews.author: DailyAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Great Item. Very sturdy and durable product. Great for ice or even ice and a few bottles of wine !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the bucket to use at a party. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bucket to use at a party. It was filled with ice and it kept very well without much melting. Placed it on a table and it was much more convenient than a ice chest to scoop from and looked nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: better than I expected. almost 1" thick walls should keep things cold. Drain plug on side, so you don't have to pick it up to get melted ice water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: baitmaster

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks much better than a cooler! Kept the ice cubes frozen solid for 12 hours plus (dumped the ice at that point). Nice for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works great and ice keeps water or ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something for corporate office meetings that was not typical looking cooler. I have sent many people to look for this item on Amazon. Love it! Works great and ice keeps water or drinks cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: JHW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, read the reviews people who dont like it are do to damaged arrival. Had it for 2 years and have used it dozens of times. Never a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Everything an ice bucket should be.
customer_reviews.text: Ice remains solid for a very long time. Bucket is easy to carry and attractively designed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps 'em cold.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Aesthetically they could do a little more work on providing an option with a more "sophisticated" look. But functionally it is great. Keeps drinks colder longer with no lid to keep opening and closing. Does not sweat, and easy to drain/clean. I haven't tested max capacity, but with plenty of ice, my experience is it easily holds 12 - 16 12oz. bottles or 18 - 24 12oz. cans.
customer_reviews.author: AlamoJDub

customer_reviews.title: Great, non-drip solution for parties!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for private parties and weddings to ice down wine and water. This is SUPER durable, high quality, insulated and does not drip or sweat. AWESOME addition to my bartender kit! You can easily fit 5 bottles of wine plus a few other items. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Galbreath

customer_reviews.title: Igloo ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: It was so nice. I wanted to purchase another one, but the price had gone up. So I bypassed it until they go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa L. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best!!!!!! Seriously, it doesn't leak and the ice stays for a longtime. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, unique gift basket base.
customer_reviews.text: Large, sturdy and arrived just as seller described. Used as a gift basket for a baseball raffle — look awesome and brought in a lot of money for baseball association.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Keeper Mama

customer_reviews.title: Fun Color and keeps ice cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a party and there was ice left in the morning! Love the colors and love the fact that there's a spigot to release water.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Party Time
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my wife's pool party. The ice didn't melt as soon as I thought it would, so the drinks remained cold for the party. BTW, it was over 100°F .
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution..
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these for over 7 years before it gave out. We use them to ice bottled water down and get constant use. Arrived in perfect condition ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Ice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome holding ice time Big space Portable Estable Good product x the price
customer_reviews.author: A. Campos

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This kept ice solid for well over 24 hours. The only thing is I wish they made a smaller size for a smaller gathering, but it’s awesome and so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Donates

customer_reviews.title: Large for a party
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for water at a wedding. It will hold numbers of water bottles and keep them cold for the event.
customer_reviews.author: ruall4dogs?

customer_reviews.title: Great for partys
customer_reviews.text: Can be used inside without risk of ruining furniture due to sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect size for a holiday gathering of 15 people
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect size for a holiday gathering of 15 people, they held the ice for a long time and are sturdy. We like them and would recommend them. We bought two given their size for gatherings of 15-20 people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is sturdy, keeps ice for a whole day (inside), and is very pretty! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Drain on the side makes it easy to pour out the water and add more ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Used inside will keep drinks cold for at least 36 hours. Drain on the side makes it easy to pour out the water and add more ice if needed. We'll be using this every Sunday once football season is back this fall.
customer_reviews.author: T Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket
customer_reviews.text: Buckets arrived with what seemed like grease marks all over it so I had to scrub it. Also both handles were broken off but I was able to get them to stay on. I hope they stay on. Nice size for what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: daniel maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I had the problem where a part on the inside of the handle was missing. Promptly requested a replacement and received it within a week.
customer_reviews.author: DesertRat

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Held ice and drinks all night - no condensation and ice easily lasted the night.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These buckets are so sturdy I use them as laundry baskets, they last forever and a bucket is about 1 load :)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality cooler bucket. Keeps drinks cold and doesn't drip condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to lift, insulated, keeps ice cold and the melted water cold. You can bleed the water from a valve at the bottom. This is not that big, but it is very useful. Does not condense on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sashin

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We orders this to hold water bottles at my daughters graduation party. It is just what I needed, can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Its purple so I love it. I've used it once poolside. Didn't leak. Kept the waters & coolers iced cold. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a BIG ice bucket for a large party - kept the ice cold and holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties.
customer_reviews.text: Great for an easy display of water, soda and beers for a party.
customer_reviews.author: j philly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Long Cooling
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for multiple bottles of wine served during parties. No sweating sides that drop in table and countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Sage

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but arrived with a broken handle
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is really nice. I purchased 2 of these last summer for a party and they worked as expected. Unfortunately, one arrived with a broke handle. Not the end of the world, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The perfect party bucket!
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight and the have zero condensation when filled with ice. Nice capacity. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I work for a brewery and use this multiple times most weeks to hold beer cans for events and tastings. Soooo much better than the "sweaty" , leaky beverage tins that is common in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable but also lightweight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Tub is larger than I expected and works really well at keeping things cold for an extended period of time. I use it for meetings and am constantly asked where I got it because they are impressed with how well it works and the large capacity it holds. Very sturdy and durable but also lightweight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: T Kraft

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this product has been perfect for serving cold drinks at the office for meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Donna Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great value! It's exactly as described and the color ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value! It's exactly as described and the color is sharp! Works well for outdoor party ice.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to store, good value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It is a nice, sturdy way to prepare for a party. And it doesn’t result in someone sitting on the cooler and making for the awkward moment trying to get a drink under someone.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Dean

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for any occasion because it keeps the drinks cool ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these recently for my son's birthday party. This is perfect for any occasion because it keeps the drinks cool and doesn't sweat and create any mess. I purchased the black one and decorated it with a chalkboard label with metallic marker. Looks great, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cooler for parties
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cooler for parties. Filled it with ice and soft drinks...everyone loves it and the ice stays frozen throughout the party.
customer_reviews.author: Naepurple

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: just what we wanted. great insulation. no sweating. and just the right size for a mid-size party.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: No sweat - it works!
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick - no sweat ice bucket. Used it for 4 hours and worked out well. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Oma123

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: Liked how they had the drain on them and the did not melt all that quickly. The only drawback is the are small
customer_reviews.author: Mike shirer

customer_reviews.title: Received item and one of the handles were missing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Received item and one of the handles were missing. Need this replaced. Who ever packet order had to notice that the handle was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Sherron Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two to use at a party. They are light, keep ice frozen for a long while. The drain hole is useful. A big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great party bucket
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to have separate containers for beverages on the counter for parties. Worked great! No condensation on the counter, and I never had to add more ice.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons College Graduation party. Looks great and held a ton of ice and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We use this cooler for the dogs water. When it heats up to over 100 degrees in the desert it has the ability to keep the dogs water cool.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Great! Ice did not melt for the whole day
customer_reviews.text: Great! Ice did not melt for the whole day. I bagged up the rest- almost a whole bag for reuse
customer_reviews.author: JILL E.

customer_reviews.title: Great party bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great party bucket! Heavy duty, easy to handle and carry, and good for all kinds of things besides beer and sodas! :-) It is just the right size, not huge, and not small. I bought several and they stack well too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mckamey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an Anniversary party for my parents, even though my husband thought we didn’t need them. Even he had to admit this was an excellent purchase! We had ice in them for 7 hours and it just barely melted! So glad I bought 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Igloo Party Bucket Cooler
feature_bullets: Ideal for in-home entertaining, game room, backyard parties, poolside, tailgating and more
Foam insulated body keeps beverages and snacks cold and will Not "sweat" like unlined tubs
Elevated base keeps cooler away from hot surfaces for better cooling
Triple-snap leak-resistant drain plug allows easy draining of melted ice
Made of durable and easy-to-clean Polypropylene nest able design for easy storage
